subject: AI & Agents
title: Existential Risk: The Long-Term Debate
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Existential Risk: The Long-Term Debate.

hook.text: Some researchers say superintelligent AI could end civilization. Others say that's science fiction.

buildup.text: Existential risk (x-risk) arguments: a misaligned superintelligence could pursue goals harmful to humanity.

discovery.text: Key concern: once AI surpasses human intelligence, we may lose the ability to correct it.

twist.text: Critics argue current AI is far from this level and x-risk diverts attention from present harms.

climax.text: Both near-term harms and long-term risks deserve attention. They're not mutually exclusive.

punchline.text: The debate isn't if we should worryâ€”it's when.

quiz.question: What is the core concern of AI existential risk?
options: A misaligned superintelligence pursuing harmful goals
